cause.description:
There is no missing link.
Darwin tried explaining it, Darwin did the best he could. Evolution, pretty theory...
1. How else explains beefalo?
2. How else explains plastic flowers?
3. How else explains fax machines?
4. How else explains Michael Jordan?
5. Religion? Astrology? Astronomy?
cause.mission: Spread the theory. Listen to Dan Bern.
cause.name: Aliens Came and Fucked the Monkey
